In addition, the mesh upper is made with recycled First Mile yarns, offering both comfort and breathability while promoting environmental sustainability. The shoe's rolled collar provides ample cushioning and a secure fit for the heel. The ELECTRIFY NITRO™ 3 is the ideal option for new runners seeking excellent cushioning and value.

The first Hoops shoe to bring Trinomic tech to the hardwood, the fresh footwear features a ProFoam+ midsole for enhanced cushioning and a Trinomic outsole for stability and style. It’s court-ready dominance combined with street cred, resulting in one of the freshest pairs of kicks we’ve ever released.

The PUMAGRIP ATR rubber outsole has been revamped with our PWRADAPT tech, allowing the lugs to move independently with the ground for supreme traction on multi-terrain. Our new, wider upper has been reinforced with PWRTAPE for support and protection, and the forefoot drain ports shed water like a champ. Dominate your run, no matter the season, with the Voyage NITRO™ 3.

modelo: Mercedes-AMG PETRONAS Speedcat Pro George Russell PUMA 75th Year Anniversary Celebration Men's Driving Shoes
descripcion: Modelled after the high-tech racing shoes worn by driver George Russel and with design inspiration from PUMA's 75 year anniversary, this limited-edition Speedcat Pro is all about showcasing the marque’s precision engineering. For starters, the model merges comfort, grip, and safety in a low profile silhouette. From a more technical standpoint, it features an ultra-lightweight fabric upper with a carbon fibre support counter to keep your feet in racing position. The EVA wedge and rubber outsole ensure the ultimate grip as you hit the pedal. Of course, the hallmark of the racing shoe is the iconic Mercedes-AMG PETRONAS emblem. What's more is that you get the exact same shoe as your favorite driver, meaning it only comes in their size.

modelo: Scuderia Ferrari Speedcat Pro Carlos Sainz PUMA 75th Year Anniversary Celebration Men's Driving Shoes

From a more technical standpoint, it features an ultra-lightweight fabric upper with a carbon fibre support counter to keep your feet in racing position. The EVA wedge and rubber outsole ensure the ultimate grip as you hit the pedal. Of course, the hallmark of the racing shoe is the iconic Ferrari shield emblazoned on the Rosso Corsa and black. Even more, this sneaker is only available in Carlos Sainz's actual foot size of 8.5. Forza Ferrari!
